name: Monster Girl Breeder
storyline:
Settling in for a vigorous and lengthy erotic game session you're suddenly whisked away to a fantasy world! Once you regain your bearings, awakened to a visual feast of boobies and butts of sexy monster girls spread out in front of you.

It is revealed that you have been summoned to this strange land for a purpose. Their village is trapped behind a barrier, and with no men inside there is no way to keep the village going. Until you arrived that is!

Rise to the call, become the Monster Girl Breeder and help these poor monster maidens repopulate their village?!
summary: Our protagonist is settling in for a gaming session with the latest erotic fantasy game, when they are suddenly whisked away to a fantasy world! Waking up in front of a horde of horny monster girls, its up to you to repopulate their isolated village!
